summary:
Jonts van Iterson |  adviseur voor huisvesting van ziekenhuizen |  hospital building consultant

My expertise is the development and evaluation of accommodation plans for hospitals, strategic accommodation visions, healthcare logistics and accommodation concepts, programs of requirements for hospital organisations. I act as the linking pin between the hospital organisation, the design and the technology.

Besides this the work included organising meetings, workshops and gatherings with for instance the board, medical staff, management.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Jonts', 'last_name': 'van Iterson', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Consultant/Owner at Jonts Hospital Advice'}]}, {'title': 'Hospital MCA, Alkmaar', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'description': 'Long Term Accommodation Plan, Program of Requirements, Design management:
